title: Zelensky reveals plan to return Ukrainians from abroad: what the authorities are preparing
text:
Zelensky reveals plan to return Ukrainians from abroad: what the authorities are preparing
Kyiv • UNN
The President held a meeting on creating economic and social incentives for the return of citizens to Ukraine. It is planned to discuss systemic solutions with representatives of Ukrainian business.
President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy held a meeting on the return of Ukrainians who left abroad due to the war. They discussed the solutions needed to create economic and social incentives for citizens to work in Ukraine. This is reported by UNN with reference to the evening address of the head of state.
Details
According to the President of Ukraine, the main task for today is to create all the necessary economic and social incentives for Ukrainians to work in Ukraine and “to make Ukraine have more potential to be on equal footing in global competition.
Today, a lot of attention was also paid to internal issues - the decisions and innovations that are needed in the future so that Ukraine can return as many of our people who left because of the war as possible
The Head of State spoke about the meeting on this issue, which was attended by Vice Prime Ministers Chernyshov, Fedorov and Kuleba, as well as the Office's team.
We are preparing more conversations with Ukrainian business representatives for tomorrow - about what systemic solutions are needed now and in the future to give Ukraine more confidence and stronger economic breath
The President noted that the Ukrainian people had proved their courage and could demonstrate to the world their ability to recover and rebuild from the ruins.
Recall
Ukraine's Foreign Minister Andriy Sybiga [announced](https://unn.ua/news/mzs-pratsiuie-nad-povernenniam-ukraintsiv-z-za-kordonu-sybiha) that he is working to create conditions for the return of Ukrainians. The Foreign Ministry is working with the European Commission to develop strategies to encourage the return of citizens.
